# [[nationality]]

====Usage notes====
Unlike in English, nationality in Chinese is expressed as a noun, not an adjective, thus illustrated in the following example:
:{{zh-x|我 的 國籍 是 中國。|My nationality is Chinese. (lit. "My nationality is China.")}}
